card.name: Blast Doors
card.text: Reduce all fire and projectile damage by 2. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Ablative Cladding
card.text: Reduce all toxic and melee damage by 2. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Earthing
card.text: Reduce all cold and lightning damage by 2. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Pinned Down
card.text: Heroes cannot play Ongoing or Equipment cards. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Sealed Chamber
card.text: If destroyed, the heroes lose the game. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn. If they do, this structure regains 5 HP

card.name: Trapped Chamber
card.text: Heroes cannot use powers. At the start of their turn, a hero may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card

card.name: Cover
card.text: Whenever a target would be damaged, redirect that damage to this card. Reduce damage dealt to this target by 1

card.name: Repair Crew
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, all structures regain 3 HP

card.name: Mercenaries
card.text: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals H - 1 energy damage to the two hero targets with the highest HP

card.name: Construction Work
card.text: At the end of the environnment turn, reveal cards from the top of the environment deck until you reveal three Structure cards. Put them into play and shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck. Then, destroy this card

card.name: Laser Rifles
card.text: Villain targets deal 1 more damage. Change all villain target damage to Energy

card.name: Stranger and Master Protocols
card.text:
Heroes cannot cause other heroes to draw cards, search their deck, regain HP, use a power, or play a card
At the start of their turn, a player may skip the rest of their turn to destroy this card
